card.name: Rock-Throwing Tank
card.text: Reach, trample You may look at the top card of your library any time. Whenever Rock-Throwing Tank attacks, you may put a permanent card from your hand or the top of your library onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Apartments // The Hospital
card.text:
When you unlock this door, create four 1/1 red Human Survivor creature tokens.
---
Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have lifelink.

card.name: Bill, the Sacrifice
card.text: Menace {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. {4}{B}{B}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Destroy all creatures you don't control.

card.name: The Sugar Mill // Return to Town
card.text:
At the beginning of your end step, target player mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
---
At the beginning of your first main phase, until end of turn, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback {0}.

card.name: Auto Shotgun
Startled Witch
card.text: Haste Whenever Startled Witch deals combat damage to a player, it deals X damage to that player, where X is half that player's life total, rounded down.

card.name: Helicopter Pilot
card.text: Flying Whenever Helicopter Pilot becomes tapped, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. When Helicopter Pilot dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: The Coaster // The Concert
card.text:
When you unlock this door, this Room deals 25 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
---
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

card.name: Zoey, Hope Against Hope
card.text: First strike Whenever Zoey, Hope Against Hope attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield tapped if it's a land. Otherwise, you may play it this turn.

card.name: Coach, Devoted Leader
card.text: When Coach, Devoted Leader enters, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls. You gain life equal to the excess damage dealt. Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Coach, Devoted Leader.

card.name: Louis, the Optimist
card.text: Vigilance Whenever one or more creatures you control coordinate a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Wedding Witch
card.text: Double strike Morbid — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Cargo Plane
The Waterfront // The Park
card.text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, draw a card.
---
Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Ellis, Killing Machine
card.text: Haste Whenever an Equipment you control enters, Ellis, Killing Machine deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Pestilent Zombies
card.text: Deathtouch Virulence costs you pay cost {1} less. Creatures you control with decayed get +1/+1.

card.name: Alarmed Car
card.text: {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Alarmed Car: Create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Sniper Rifle
Jockey Ride
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When Jockey Ride enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature loses all abilities and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Pummeling Charger
card.text: Virulence {4}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.) Trample

card.name: Ravenous Horde
card.text: Lifelink, haste Morbid — When Ravenous Horde enters, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Headshot
card.text: Coordinate (You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.) Headshot deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If this spell was coordinated, destroy that creature instead.

card.name: Team Healer
card.text: Vigilance When Team Healer enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature you control. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Rooftop Smoker
card.text: Reach Whenever Rooftop Smoker or another creature you control enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Bilious Boomer
card.text: Virulence {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.) When Bilious Boomer dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Molotov Throw
card.text: Coordinate (You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.) Molotov Throw deals 3 damage to target creature. If this spell was coordinated, it deals 5 damage to that creature instead. If a creature dealt damage by Molotov Throw would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Fallen CEDA Agent
card.text: Virulence {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.) Lifelink

card.name: Ensnaring Smoker
card.text: Virulence {5}{U} (You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.) When Ensnaring Smoker enters, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Rocket-Launched Survivor
card.text: Flying Whenever Rocket-Launched Survivor becomes tapped, another target creature you control without flying gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Spawn-Point Scouting
card.text: Coordinate (You may tap two creatures you control as you cast this spell.) This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's coordinated. Surveil 2, then draw two cards. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Katana Wielder
card.text: First strike Whenever Katana Wielder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Expert Tactician
card.text: Vigilance Morbid — When Expert Tactician enters, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card unless a creature died this turn.

card.name: Ceiling Hunter
card.text: Flying Whenever Ceiling Hunter attacks, untap up to two target creatures you control.

card.name: Swamp Fever
card.text: Morbid — This spell costs {2} less to cast if a creature died this turn. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Reckless Speedster
card.text: Menace Rush 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it get +2/+0 and gain "When this creature dies, draw a card" until end of turn. If you do, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Cacophonous Crows
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Noxious Spitter
card.text: Virulence {5}{B} (You may cast this spell for its virulence cost. If you do, when it enters, create a token that's a copy of it with decayed.) When Noxious Spitter enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Eviscerating Hunter
card.text: During your turn, Eviscerating Hunter has first strike. {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Infected Clown
card.text: Menace Whenever Infected Clown attacks, another target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Resourceful Survivor
card.text: When Resourceful Survivor enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Infected Riot Guards
Incendiary Explosion
card.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Incendiary Explosion deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Pipe Bomb
card.text: Flash When Pipe Bomb enters, sacrifice it. When you do, choose one — • Tap target creature and put two stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) • Pipe Bomb deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Electric Guitar
card.text: When Electric Guitar enters, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature attacks, target creature can't block it this turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Green Flu Mutation
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
